changeSet.createView: SELECT CASH_CHECK_LINE.ID AS ID, CASH_CHECK.ID AS CHECK_ID, CASH_CHECK.FISCAL_DOCUMENT_NUMBER AS FISCAL_DOCUMENT_NUMBER, CASH_CHECK.CHECK_DATE AS CHECK_DATE, CASHIER.ID AS CASHIER_ID, SHOP.ID AS SHOP_ID, ORGANIZATION.ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID, CASH_CHECK.TELEGRAM_USER_ID AS TELEGRAM_USER_ID, CASH_CHECK.TOTAL_SUM AS CHECK_TOTAL_SUM, CASH_CHECK.CASH_SUM AS CASH_SUM, CASH_CHECK.ECASH_SUM AS ECASH_SUM, PRODUCT.ID AS PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, CASH_CHECK_LINE.PRICE AS PRICE, CASH_CHECK_LINE.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY, CASH_CHECK_LINE.TOTAL_SUM AS LINE_TOTAL_SUM FROM CASH_CHECK JOIN CASH_CHECK_LINE ON CASH_CHECK.ID = CASH_CHECK_LINE.CHECK_ID JOIN PRODUCT ON CASH_CHECK_LINE.PRODUCT_ID = PRODUCT.id JOIN CASHIER ON CASH_CHECK.CASHIER_ID = CASHIER.id JOIN SHOP ON CASHIER.SHOP_ID = SHOP .id JOIN ORGANIZATION ON SHOP.ORGANIZATION_ID = ORGANIZATION.id
